com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec

Interface TagDecoder<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value
    All Superinterfaces:
    TagReader<V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TagStrategy<S,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TagStrategies

    public interface TagDecoder<V>
extends TagReader<V>
    The TagDecoder is a sub-interface of TagReader to add functionality for automatic recognition of data types and ValueTypes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handles(Input input, long offset)
      Reads the data item at the current offset and returns true if this item can be handled by the current TagDecoder instance, otherwise false.
      TypeSpec handles(long tagId)
      Returns the assigned TypeSpec of this TagDecoder's data item if the given tagId matches the current one, otherwise null.
      ValueType valueType(Input input, long offset)
      Reads the data item at the current offset and returns the corresponding ValueType if this item can be handled by the current TagDecoder instance, otherwise null.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.noctarius.borabora.spi.codec.TagReader

        process

    • Method Detail

      • handles

        boolean handles(Input input,
                long offset)
        Reads the data item at the current offset and returns true if this item can be handled by the current TagDecoder instance, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        input - the current input instance
        offset - the current data item's offset
        Returns:
        true when the TagDecoder can handle the current stream's data item, otherwise false

      • handles

        TypeSpec handles(long tagId)
        Returns the assigned TypeSpec of this TagDecoder's data item if the given tagId matches the current one, otherwise null.
        Parameters:
        tagId - the tagId to test
        Returns:
        the current TypeSpec if the tagId matches, otherwise null.

      • valueType

        ValueType valueType(Input input,
                    long offset)
        Reads the data item at the current offset and returns the corresponding ValueType if this item can be handled by the current TagDecoder instance, otherwise null.
        Parameters:
        input - the current input instance
        offset - the current data item's offset
        Returns:
        the corresponding ValueType when the TagDecoder can handle the current stream's data item, otherwise null
